body.para: PASS: update apr-0.9 PASS: update apr-util-0.9 PASS: update httpd-2.0 PASS: update subversion PASS: autogen.sh BUILD: apr-0.9 PASS: apr-0.9::check rebuild status BUILD: apr-util-0.9 PASS: apr-util-0.9::check rebuild status BUILD: httpd-2.0 PASS: httpd-2.0::check rebuild status
BUILD: trunk r14168 on i686-pc-linux-gnu shared
PASS: check build type PASS: create object directory

run_configure() { testing=/home/brane/svn/testing srcdir="$1" shift env CC='gcc-3.0' \ "${srcdir}/configure" \ "--prefix=/home/brane/svn/inst" \ "--with-berkeley-db=/usr/local/BerkeleyDB.4.2" \ "--with-dbm=db42" \ "--with-apr=${testing}-inst/apr-0.9/bin/apr-config" \ "--with-apr-util=${testing}-inst/apr-util-0.9/bin/apu-config" \ "--with-apxs=${testing}-inst/httpd-2.0/bin/apxs" \ "--with-zlib" \ "--with-ssl" \ "--with-swig=/usr/local" \ "$@" }
run_configure ../svn-trunk "$@" PASS: configure PASS: build PASS: install PASS: svn-trunk::rebuild flag
TEST: trunk r14168 on i686-pc-linux-gnu shared ra_local fsfs

PASS: check build type PASS: check RA type PASS: check FS type PASS: check object directory PASS: check svn executable PASS: check svnadmin executable PASS: check svnlook executable PASS: check svnserve executable PASS: check svnversion executable PASS: make check PASS: Timer: make check 1786 sec
